body:
This is a great discussion!



Mauricio, Honeybee uses OpenStudio template as the default library. I'm sure OpenStudio team would be happy to hear your comments about the glazing data-set. In the next version we will add a new input to set-up the construction based on climate zone and modeling standard ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/398](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/398)).



Chris, The import Window material is huge. I wasn't actually aware of it. Well done!



Mostapha
